conbody.p: Our commitment to the environment, health and safety is integral to our Global Code of Conduct and is reflected in our Company values and sustainability goals. All Space employees are responsible to act in a manner that advances us on our journey to environmental, health and safety excellence through reducing injuries and illnesses, minimizing our impact on the environment, and protecting natural resources. We are committed to meeting or exceeding all environmental, health and safety laws and regulations. The Space Global Leadership Team will lead by example while providing guidance to support the Company's purpose and vision through key programs such as Space CARES, which focus on an integrated culture with high employee and management engagement.
